name: Meat Lovers Pizza
description: Loaded with pepperoni, sausage, bacon, and ham
fullDescription: Ultimate meat lovers pizza with pepperoni, Italian sausage, crispy bacon, and Canadian ham on mozzarella cheese.

name: Veggie Deluxe Pizza
description: Fresh vegetables with mushrooms, peppers, and olives
fullDescription: Garden fresh pizza with mushrooms, bell peppers, red onions, black olives, tomatoes, and fresh basil.

name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
description: Grilled chicken with BBQ sauce and red onions
fullDescription: Tender grilled chicken with tangy BBQ sauce, red onions, cilantro, and mozzarella cheese.
